mapper.select: SELECT IDX, NAME, PRICE, CATEGORY_BIG, CATEGORY_SMALL FROM T_PENALTY ORDER BY IDX DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PENALTY ( NAME, PRICE, CATEGORY_BIG, CATEGORY_SMALL, CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{price}, #{categoryBig}, #{categorySmall}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, TITLE, CONTENTS, HIT_CNT, IS_DEL, WRITER_ID, WRITER_NAME, CREATE_DT FROM T_NOTICE ORDER BY IDX DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_NOTICE ( TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER_IDX, WRITER_ID, WRITER_NAME, CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, #{writerIdx}, #{writerId}, #{writerName}, now() )
